hed: 15 Times The Little Mix Girls Had The Hair Of Your Dreams
socialTitle: 15 Times The Little Mix Girls Had The Hair Of Your Dreams

items.caption:
When squad goals meet hair goals, it's a truly beautiful thing. And that's exactly what the British girl group [Little Mix](http://www.teenvogue.com/tag/little-mix) have managed to do, inducing quite the hair envy in all of us every time one of Perrie, Leigh-Anne, Jesy or Jade's killer styles pops up on our Instagram feed.

They have a new single out called “[Hair](http://www.teenvogue.com/story/little-mix-hair-stream-breakup-anthem),” so it only seems appropriate that they've mastered every look from sleek ponytails to volumized blowouts. If you're not yet familiar, let this serve as your crash course in the many crazy, quirky and cool hairstyles of our new favorite quartet. Because if the Spice Girls taught us anything (besides girl power) it was the importance of a girl band's hair — please see Posh's sleek bob, Scary's enviable curls, Baby's blonde pigtails, Sporty's high pony and Ginger's well, ginger hair, for further proof.

Allow us to introduce you to all of the hair inspo you'll ever need. And Little Mix, consider this our official request to join the group, please and thanks.
When their hairstylist Aaron Carlo gave them these braided high ponytails, and we never wanted to be part of a girl group more.
When Jade matched her eyeshadow to her blue glitter part.
When Leigh-Anne's curls were so flawless, there was really no competing. We knew it, she knew it. Case closed.
When Jesy's red glaze shone so brightly in the sun, we almost had to look away.
When Perrie wore the Dior chain runway pony IRL and proved she's a beauty badass.
When Jesy's curls were so big, we had to see them twice.
When Leigh-Anne wore this half up, half down, tousled style.
When Perrie went with major waves, too, because the more volume the better.
Like, seriously, they've mastered braided styles.
When Perrie went high-fashion with a slicked back look and attitude to match.
When Jesy started in on the hair metal trend before we even knew it was a thin
And Jade went festival, too, with a classic flower crown.
And finally, when they all sported a style fitting each of their personalities…and made these goofy faces to go with it.

seoTitle: The Best Instagram Hair Inspiration - Little Mix
seoDescription: The girls of Little Mix have mastered every look from sleek ponytails to volumized blowouts, inducing hair envy whenever they pop up on our Instagram feed.

fields.name: Marissa DeSantis
fields.bio:
__What sort of advice would you give your 18-year-old self?__

Sometimes even if you put in the work, things won't go the way you wanted them to the first time around. It's okay to be disappointed, but don't let it discourage you from trying again. And don't be too hard on yourself because things always have a way of working out -- I still need to give myself this advice.


__What’s your favorite *Teen Vogue* moment?__


Gemma Ward's Teen Vogue cover from waaaay back in 2006. I was in high school at the time and she was my absolute favorite model -- it's still probably stashed in my room at home somewhere. Then, of course, having been such a fan of Teen Vogue, seeing my first post on the site.


__What beauty product are you loving right now?__

I could never pick just one, so bear with me here..the Dr. Jart+ Vital Hydra Solution sheet mask because it instantly perks up your skin, Rimmel London Wonder Lash Mascara, Charlotte Tilbury Beach Stick in Las Salinas and the Butter London Lip Crayon in the bright pink shade, Primrose Hill Picnic.


__What fashion item seems to always be on your shopping list?__

Turtlenecks, dresses and boots -- always in black.


__What’s your go-to karaoke song?__

"Spice Up Your Life" or really anything by the Spice Girls.


__Who’s your favorite model and why?__

I've always been a big fan of Georgia May Jagger's quirky/cool style, especially after meeting her and learning she's also funny and kind, too.


__What’s your favorite Instagram to follow (other than *Teen Vogue*)?__

If I want fun beauty pics, [@louteasdale](http://instagram.com/louteasdale). If I want to laugh, [@brosbeingbasic](http://instagram.com/brosbeingbasic).
fields.title: Freelance Beauty Editor
